get.description: Lists all of the available Orbital Rest API operations.

200.description: OK. The request has succeeded.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed. If the resource group does not exist, 404 (NotFound) will be returned.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of Ground Station resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed. If the resource group does not exist, 404 (NotFound) will be returned.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed. If the resource group does not exist, 404 (NotFound) will be returned.

get.description: Gets the specified ground station in a specified resource group.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting ground station resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a ground station resource.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The parameters to provide for the created ground station.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting ground station resource.

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting ground station resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates the specified ground station tags.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to update ground station tags.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting Ground Station resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes a specified ground station resource.

200.description: Delete successful.

204.description: Request successful. Resource does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of global communications sites.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed. If the resource group does not exist, 404 (NotFound) will be returned.

value.description: A list of ground station resources.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

GroundStationListResult.description: Response for the ListGroundStations API service call.

GroundStation.description: Ground Station contains one or more antennas.

globalCommunicationsSite.description: A reference to global communications site.

EdgeSitesProperties.description: Properties object for an edge site.

name.description: The unique name of the partnerRouter.

PartnerRouter.description: One of the partner routers within a global communications site.

city.description: The city of the location (e.g., Miami).

district.description: For example, the state (e.g., Florida), province (e.g., Ontario), or region (e.g., Tuscany) of the location.

country.description: The nation (e.g., United States of America) of the location.

closestAzureRegion.description: The name of the closest Azure region, (e.g., westus2).

extra.description: Any extra information needed to uniquely identify the location (e.g., zip code).

LocationData.description: Describes a location outside of Azure.

GlobalCommunicationsSiteType.description: The type of the global communications site. groundStations can only use sites of type GroundStation, and edgeSites can only use sites of type Edge.

locationData.description: Describes the location of the global communications site.

globalCommunicationsSiteType.description: The type of the global communications site. EdgeSite or GroundStation.

partnerRouters.description: Partner routers connected to this site.

partnerSiteBandwidth.description: The bandwidth per partner router cross-connection at this global communications site, measured in bits per second.

GlobalCommunicationsSitesProperties.description: Properties object for a global communications site.

properties.description: The properties bag for this resource.

GlobalCommunicationsSite.description: A site where the Orbital network is connected to a partner network.

value.description: A list of global communications sites.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

GlobalCommunicationsSiteListResult.description: Response for an API service call that lists Global Communications Sites.

properties.description: The properties bag for this resource.

EdgeSite.description: A customer's reference to a global communications site site.

value.description: A list of edge site resources.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

EdgeSiteListResult.description: Response for an API service call that lists Edge Sites.

provisioningState.description: The current state of the resource's creation, deletion, or modification.

circuitId.description: Globally-unique identifier for this connection that is to be used as a circuit ID.

edgeSite.description: A reference to an Microsoft.Orbital/edgeSites resource to route traffic for.

name.description: The unique name of the partner router that cross-connects with the Orbital Edge Router at the edge site.

edgeSitePartnerRouter.description: The name of the partner router that cross-connects with the Orbital Edge Router at the edge site.

groundStation.description: A reference to an Microsoft.Orbital/groundStations resource to route traffic for.

name.description: The unique name of the partner router that cross-connects with the Orbital Edge Router at the ground station site.

groundStationPartnerRouter.description: The name of the partner router to establish a connection to within the ground station.

vlanId.description: The VLAN ID for the L2 connection.

L2ConnectionsProperties.description: Properties object for an L2 Connection.

properties.description: The properties bag for this resource.

L2Connection.description: Connects an edge site to an orbital gateway and describes what layer 2 traffic to forward between them.

value.description: A list of L2 Connection resources.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

L2ConnectionListResult.description: Response for an API service call that lists L2 Connections.

value.description: A list of Azure Resource IDs.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

ResourceIdListResult.description: Response for an API service call that lists the resource IDs of resources associated with another resource.

ProvisioningState.description: The current state of the resource's creation, deletion, or modification.

longitudeDegrees.description: Longitude of the ground station in decimal degrees.

latitudeDegrees.description: Latitude of the ground station in decimal degrees.

releaseMode.description: Release Status of a ground station.

globalCommunicationsSite.description: A reference to global communications site.

GroundStationsProperties.description: List of ground station resource properties.

mbps.description: The approximate number of megabits per second that are provisioned for the partner on this global communications site.

ProvisionedBandwidth.description: The approximate bandwidth provisioned for a partner on a global communications site.

skipTokenParameter.name: $skiptoken
skipTokenParameter.description: An opaque string that the resource provider uses to skip over previously-returned results. This is used when a previous list operation call returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a nextLink element, the value of the nextLink element will include a skiptoken parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.
